title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jun 30 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jun 30 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1: Shock! Dems cheat in NYC mayoral election. Left-wing candidate Maya Wiley says mail-in ballots were mishandled. Isn't this what Trump said? Montage of Democrats saying they want to defund the police. NYT switches top story from Democrat NYC mayoral election debacle to another January 6th riot story. Narrative over truth. Lori Lightfoot says crime is not out of control in Chicago. Clay predicts Democrats in NYC mayoral primary vote debacle will start to accuse each other of racism and sexism.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
